thread.title: Sam simply the best, says ‘Fro Bro’
thread.title_full: Sam simply the best, says ‘Fro Bro’

title: Sam simply the best, says ‘Fro Bro’
text:
NRL grand final 2015: Sam Thaiday rated with best props in game CHRIS GARRY The Courier-Mail NRL grand final 2015: Sam Thaiday rated with best props in game CHRIS GARRY The Courier-Mail Wayne Bennett: Broncos got in a comfort zone 0:40 
NRL 360: Broncos coach Wayne Bennett says his side got in a "comfort zone" during his stint away from the club. September 30th 2015 11 hours ago /video/video.news.com.au/Sport/NRL/Shows/NRL 360/ 
ADAM Blair says frustrated backrower Sam Thaiday deserves to be ranked among the NRL’s best props. 
Thaiday clashes with the player most rate as the code’s best front-rower, Matt Scott, this Sunday in the NRL grand final. 
Thaiday had to revert to prop, a position he doesn’t prefer, from Round 18 after Josh McGuire suffered a season-ending injury. Other Stories
